Title: Requires gas stations to maintain backup generators capable of operating the gas pumps in the case of loss of electricity
Summary: Requires gas stations to maintain backup generators capable of operating the gas pumps in the case of loss of electricity.
LawCode: Add ยง399-eee, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to requiring gas stations to maintain a backup generator to operate gas pumps in the event of loss of electricity
